name: Factory Tank
description:
Somebody is messing with the factory shipping equipment! Its up to you to move the boxes to their correct color coordinated areas. Watch out for those pesky monsters trying to stop your plans!

(Move the Red boxes to the Top Conveyor Belt and the Green boxes to the Bottom Conveyor Belt)

Controls)

WASD: Move

Left Mouse Button: Shoot

Spacebar: Pickup/Drop boxes
